readable.title: 543363241_74d8246fab
readable.content: A bearded man wears a red bandanna and a leather jacket over a teeshirt with an American flag on it . A man dressed in black leather with a red bandanna is smiling at the camera . A man wearing a leather jacket . a man wearing a red headband and a leather outfit standing outside . A man with a beard , red headband , and leather vest smiles .
